hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Umar:The Prophet (ﷺ) offered the Maghrib and `Isha' prayers together at Jam' (i.e. Al-Muzdalifa) with a separate Iqama for each of them and did not offer any optional prayer in between them or after each of them

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ جَمَعَ بَيْنَهُمَا وَلَمْ يَتَطَوَّعْ
chapter.eng-name: Whoever combined the two prayer at one time
